mapper.select: SELECT bname , MAX(hash) hash, writer , trans , gname , name , id , publish , postcont, prof.save_loc profile, largeimg limg FROM booktab b, genretab g , membertab m, publishtab pub, poststab p, (SELECT h.pno pno, '#'||LISTAGG(hname, '#') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY hname DESC) hash FROM poststab p, hashtab h WHERE p.pno = h.pno GROUP BY h.pno)h, profilepictab prof WHERE b.genre = g.genre AND b.bno = p.bno AND pub.publish_no = b.publish_no AND m.mno = p.mno AND p.pno = h.pno AND prof.mno = m.mno AND (bname LIKE #{keyword} OR WRITER LIKE #{keyword} OR TRANS LIKE #{keyword} OR gname LIKE #{keyword} OR hash LIKE #{keyword} OR name LIKE #{keyword} OR id LIKE #{keyword} OR nickname LIKE #{keyword} OR publish LIKE #{keyword}) Group By bname , writer , trans , gname , name , id , nickname , publish , postcont, prof.save_loc, largeimg
